OOC: Argh, ya did sort of ruin Gangon's relationship with Brightblade with =
that ability, ya did!...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: LurkerAby=
ss 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, June 11, 2001 7:56 PM
  S=
ubject: Slaughter's/Skulletron's Ability


  Okay, I'll spill the beans on =
Slaughter's abilty.  Okay, here goes.  Okay, I got it.  Okay, get ready.  O=
kay, I say okay a lot.  Okay?  Okay!  Okay, here goes.  Okay, I said thay a=
lready, so I'll just say it all now.  Damn, I'm serious, I cant stop saying=
 okay!  DAMN!  *slaps self silly for 45 minutes straight!*  Whew, oka--THER=
E I GO AGAIN!   *holds breath for 20 minutes.....nearly dies*  No more okay=
s!  Okay?  Doh!
   
    See, Skulletron had a special mental ability, he ha=
d the ability to connect his mind with others' minds, and see what they are=
 thinking, without them knowing.  They wouldn't know that he connected with=
 their minds unless he told them, or they figured out some other way like t=
hat.  And, here's the part that his ability is all about, or that he has mo=
stly used it for.  Some of his victims have been Zardus(by request), and tw=
o other characters named Ga-I forget, and BrightBlade.  And also, Skulletro=
n used it,(sorry I did that without notice guys, who remember that!) to sor=
t of gain access to everything, codes, cameras, on the CF.  And now, I'm go=
nna use it again, on Motormaster!  Muahaha!  Don't worry, it's not THAT dev=
astating...Unless I made Skulle-er-Slaughter, make Motormaster commit suici=
de(or convince him.)  See, he can display images and sounds to try and chan=
ge one's emotions and feelings about something or somebody.  He made two pe=
ople fall in love by displaying images of hearts around one person, and stu=
ff.  And, when Zardus asked him to, Skulletron eventually made Zardus give =
off a little giggle, by displaying (corny) humorous things.  Now, in my nex=
t post, tell what Motormaster feels.....

        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
  =

f Service.
